# ExpenseVault.TransactionService Documentation

<!-- Generated by Copilot -->

Welcome to the ExpenseVault.TransactionService documentation!

## Overview

**ExpenseVault.TransactionService** is a .NET 10 microservice for managing financial transactions. It provides a RESTful API for creating, querying, and managing transactions, recurring transactions, and attachments.
